input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Eating citrus has a direct effect on vitmain C. Vitmain C has a direct effect on scurvy. The overall probability of citrus intake is 12%. The probability of absence of citrus and scurvy is 34%. The probability of citrus intake and scurvy is 2%. Is the chance of scurvy larger when observing citrus intake?
